title: Eden *
text: In his gardens and his public showrooms Jack Larsen frequently takes advantage of the aesthetic created by focusing one individual type of flower. In this 1960s vision of <I>Eden<I> the design studio emphasized bold graphic elements and deep saturated colors.
description: Print on plain weave cotton with texture. Large (to 10\") flowers. Vert repeat  27\". Print on plain weave cotton. Large rust and purple flowers. 27\" vertical repeat Purple/rust/Endive
